Package gameComponents

Class Match

java.lang.Object
gameComponents.Match
public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
Match class is the class representing the match of a game, so everything concerning who is actually playing, which turn is it, the gameBoard and its state (so what tokens are in it), whose turn is it and so on. Conceptually talking, this class is part of the gameComponents package, that represents where the logic of the application lies in. This means that other classes interact with this package and, ideally, with this class only, being the direct frontier of the external view of the internal logic.
Author:
andre

  • Field Details

    • turn

      private int turn
      Variable turn is the variable indicating the turn of the match. According to the number of boxes in the gameboard, the last possible turn for as match is the 42nd: as stated in the Board class, the number of rows is 6, while the number of columns is 7; if we calculate the product rows x columns, we obtain the number 42, that is the total amount of fillable boxes in which players can insert the token. So, if neither of the players has won till the end and the gameboard is full, they must have reached the 42nd turn of the match. First turn is set to 1, in order to give user readability.

    • gameBoard

      private Board gameBoard
      Variable gameboard is the gameboard of the match

    • firstPlayer

      private Player firstPlayer
      firstPlayer is the player ideally inserted first in the match. It does not represent the player playing first in the match.

    • secondPlayer

      private Player secondPlayer
      secondPlayer is the player ideally inserted second in the match. It does not represent the player playing second in the match.

    • isFirstPlayerPlaying

      private boolean isFirstPlayerPlaying
      Variable isFirstPlayerPlaying is true if the first player is playing, false otherwise. This determines the correct succeeding of turns in the match.

  • Constructor Details

    • Match

      public Match​(Player p1, Player p2)
      Basic constructor for the Match class Note that variable turn is set to 1. So the match will begin with turn labeled to 1. In addition, it is created a new Board.
      Parameters:
      p1 - is the first player
      p2 - is the second player

    • Match

      public Match​(Board gameboard, Player p1, Player p2)
      Basic constructor for the Match class Note that variable turn is set to 1. So the match will begin with turn labeled to 1.
      Parameters:
      gameboard - is the gameboard of the match
      p1 - is the first player
      p2 - is the second player

  • Method Details

    • whoPlaysFirst

      public boolean whoPlaysFirst()
      Method for determining which player plays first. This player could be first or second player.
      Returns:
      isFirstPlayerPlaying true if firstPlayer plays first, false otherwise.

    • insertInBoard

      public void insertInBoard​(Token token, int column) throws FullColumnException
      Method for inserting a token in a given column in the gameBoard of the match. It simply calls the insert method of the Board class to complete the mediation between classes.
      Parameters:
      token - is the token to be inserted.
      column - is the column where the token has to be inserted.
      Throws:
      FullColumnException - exception of a full column.

    • getIsFirstPlayerPlaying

      public boolean getIsFirstPlayerPlaying()
      Method for getting isFirstPlayerPlaying.
      Returns:
      isFirstPlayerPlaying variable value.

    • getFirstPlayer

      public Player getFirstPlayer()
      Method that returns the first player of the match.
      Returns:
      the first player.

    • getSecondPlayer

      public Player getSecondPlayer()
      Method that returns the second player of the match.
      Returns:
      the second player.

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Method that returns the gameboard of the match.
      Returns:
      the gameboard.

    • getTurn

      public int getTurn()
      Method that returns the turn of the match being played.
      Returns:
      turn the current turn of the match.

    • setFirstPlayerPlaying

      public void setFirstPlayerPlaying​(boolean firstPlayerPlaying)
      Method for setting isFirstPlayerPlaying variable.
      Parameters:
      firstPlayerPlaying - is true if first player is playing.

    • setFirstPlayer

      public void setFirstPlayer​(Player firstPlayer)
      Method for setting Player firstPlayer.
      Parameters:
      firstPlayer - is a player of the match, namely the first being inserted. This is not necessarily the player beginning the match.

    • setSecondPlayer

      public void setSecondPlayer​(Player secondPlayer)
      Method for setting Player secondPlayer.
      Parameters:
      secondPlayer - is a player of the match, namely the second being inserted. This is not necessarily the player making his move after the first player, but could be the player beginning the match.

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard​(Board gameBoard)
      Method for setting the Board of the match.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - is the Board object to be set.

    • setTurn

      public void setTurn​(int turn)
      Method for setting the turn of the match.
      Parameters:
      turn - is the turn to be set.
